dialog.createOrder: This action will send an order to the waiter. Are you sure you want to continue?
dialog.deleteItem: This action will delete this item from your order. Are you sure you want to continue?
dialog.deleteOption: This action will delete this option from the selected item. Are you sure you want to continue?

empty: Tvoja košarica je prazna. Ovdje ćeš vidjeti popis proizvoda koje si odabrao/la za naplatu.
